message.content: {"id": "17703", "title": "Bug 17703 - EditAdd Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does", "description": "When executing the 'Add Task' action by selecting a CU (Compilation Unit) in the Packages view and pressing F1, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu. This inconsistency should be addressed so that the 'Add Task' action uses the same dialog as the Java editor.", "OB": "When selecting a CU in the Packages view and executing the 'File > Add Task' action while observing, a dialog different from the one displayed in the Java editor's ruler context menu is shown.", "EB": "", "SR": ""}

origin.input_content:
